Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 72nd overall pick, by Longport in 1982...
Traded from Longport to Coney Island on 7/8/1984 (Going to LP: P C. Benson, C P. Engler. Going to CI: P S. Driggers, C C. Lane)...
Injured on 4/5/1985 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1988, off Allen Lent (WT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/1988, off Glenn Salazar (MAN)...
